00009     public class Bing:OpenSearch.OpenSearch
00010     {
00011         public Bing()
00012             : base()
00013         {
00014             APILocation = "http://api.search.live.net/xml.aspx?query={0}&{1}";
00015             APPID = "";
00016         }

00018         public List<string> CheckSpelling(string Item)
00019         {
00020             List<string> ReturnList=new List<string>();
00021             string AdditionalInfo="&sources={0}&appid={1}";
00022             AdditionalInfo=string.Format(AdditionalInfo,"spell",APPID);
00023             XmlDocument Doc = new XmlDocument();
00024             Doc.LoadXml(Search(Item, AdditionalInfo));
00025             XmlNamespaceManager NamespaceManager = new XmlNamespaceManager(Doc.NameTable);
00026             NamespaceManager.AddNamespace("api", "http://schemas.microsoft.com/LiveSearch/2008/04/XML/element");
00027             NamespaceManager.AddNamespace("spl", "http://schemas.microsoft.com/LiveSearch/2008/04/XML/spell");
00028             XmlNodeList Nodes = Doc.DocumentElement.SelectNodes("./spl:Spell/spl:Results/spl:SpellResult/spl:Value", NamespaceManager);
00029             foreach (XmlNode Element in Nodes)
00030             {
00031                 ReturnList.Add(Element.InnerText);
00032             }
00033             return ReturnList;
00034         }
00035 
00036         public string APPID { get; set; }
00037     }
